languages.text: "Мы прорабатываем маршруты поставок для вольных чартистов. Видите ли, пустотный корабль, на котором я нахожусь, является представителем Торгового флота в этой части имперской территории, однако лишен постоянного торгового маршрута, закрепленного хартией. Наша обязанность — устанавливать деловые контакты с теми, кому необходим регулярный ремонт кораблей, а также теми, кто интересуется весьма специфическими товарами".

traits.locale_text: "Стоит на рейде в ожидании свежих поставок от чартистов. видите ли, пустотный корабль, на котором я нахожусь, является официальным казначейским судном Имперского флота в этой части имперской территории. Наша обязанность — устанавливать деловые контакты с теми, кто обеспечивает коллатеральное снабжение Флота, а также теми, кто интересуется весьма специфическими товарами..."

languages.text: "We develop supply routes for Chartists. You see, my ship is a representative of the Merchant Fleet in this part of Imperium territory, yet we do not have a fixed, charter-defined trade route. Our mission is to establish business contacts with voidfarers in need of regular ship repairs and those who are interested in specialised goods."
languages.original_text: "Мы прорабатываем маршруты поставок для вольных чартистов. Видите ли, пустотный корабль, на котором я нахожусь, является представителем Торгового флота в этой части имперской территории, однако лишен постоянного торгового маршрута, закрепленного хартией. Наша обязанность — устанавливать деловые контакты с теми, кому необходим регулярный ремонт кораблей, а также теми, кто интересуется весьма специфическими товарами".

traits.locale_text: "We develop supply routes for Chartists. You see, my ship is a representative of the Merchant Fleet in this part of Imperium territory, yet we do not have a fixed, charter-defined trade route. Our mission is to establish business contacts with voidfarers in need of regular ship repairs and those who are interested in specialised goods."

"We develop supply routes for Chartists. You see, my ship is a representative of the Merchant Fleet in this part of Imperium territory, yet we do not have a fixed, charter-defined trade route. Our mission is to establish business contacts with voidfarers in need of regular ship repairs and those who are interested in specialised goods."

"We develop supply routes for Chartists. You see, my ship is a representative of the Merchant Fleet in this part of Imperium territory, yet we do not have a fixed, charter-defined trade route. Our mission is to establish business contacts with voidfarers in need of regular ship repairs and those who are interested in specialised goods."

languages.text: 「我々はチャーティストのための補給ルートを開拓している。まあ、私の船はこの帝国領域内の通商船団の代表船ではあるのだが、まだ憲章で規定された固定の通商ルートは持っていない。我々の任務は、船の修理を必要とする虚空渡り達や、特製品に興味のある連中とのコネを作ることなのさ」
languages.original_text: "We develop supply routes for Chartists. You see, my ship is a representative of the Merchant Fleet in this part of Imperium territory, yet we do not have a fixed, charter-defined trade route. Our mission is to establish business contacts with voidfarers in need of regular ship repairs and those who are interested in specialised goods."

traits.locale_text: 「我々はチャーティストのための補給ルートを開拓している。まあ、私の船はこの帝国領域内の通商船団の代表船ではあるのだが、まだ憲章で規定された固定の通商ルートは持っていない。我々の任務は、船の修理を必要とする虚空渡り達や、特製品に興味のある連中とのコネを作ることなのさ」

languages.text: « Nous établissons des itinéraires de ravitaillement pour les Cartographes. Mon vaisseau représente la Flotte marchande dans cette zone du territoire de l'Imperium, voyez-vous, mais nous n'avons pas de trajet spécifique prédéfini par les cartes. Notre mission est donc de signer des contacts commerciaux avec les voyageurs stellaires qui ont besoin de faire régulièrement réparer leurs astronefs, ou qui s'intéressent à des marchandises spécialisées. »
languages.original_text: "We develop supply routes for Chartists. You see, my ship is a representative of the Merchant Fleet in this part of Imperium territory, yet we do not have a fixed, charter-defined trade route. Our mission is to establish business contacts with voidfarers in need of regular ship repairs and those who are interested in specialised goods."

traits.locale_text: « Nous établissons des itinéraires de ravitaillement pour les Cartographes. Mon vaisseau représente la Flotte marchande dans cette zone du territoire de l'Imperium, voyez-vous, mais nous n'avons pas de trajet spécifique prédéfini par les cartes. Notre mission est donc de signer des contacts commerciaux avec les voyageurs stellaires qui ont besoin de faire régulièrement réparer leurs astronefs, ou qui s'intéressent à des marchandises spécialisées. »

languages.text: “我们为宪章船长开辟补给路线。如您所知，我的船是帝国这片区域商船舰队的代表，但我们并没有固定的特许贸易路线。我们的任务是寻找那些需要定期修理舰船的虚空旅者，以及对特殊商品感兴趣的人，与他们建立商业联系。”
languages.original_text: "We develop supply routes for Chartists. You see, my ship is a representative of the Merchant Fleet in this part of Imperium territory, yet we do not have a fixed, charter-defined trade route. Our mission is to establish business contacts with voidfarers in need of regular ship repairs and those who are interested in specialised goods."

traits.locale_text: “我们为宪章船长开辟补给路线。如您所知，我的船是帝国这片区域商船舰队的代表，但我们并没有固定的特许贸易路线。我们的任务是寻找那些需要定期修理舰船的虚空旅者，以及对特殊商品感兴趣的人，与他们建立商业联系。”

languages.text: "Wir entwickeln Versorgungsrouten für Chartisten. Ihr müsst wissen, mein Schiff repräsentiert die Händlerflotte in diesem Teil des Territoriums des Imperiums, aber wir haben keine feste, vertraglich geregelte Handelsroute. Unsere Mission lautet, Geschäftskontakte mit Raumfahreren zu etablieren, die regelmäßig Schiffsreparaturen benötigen und Interesse an besonderen Waren haben."
languages.original_text: "We develop supply routes for Chartists. You see, my ship is a representative of the Merchant Fleet in this part of Imperium territory, yet we do not have a fixed, charter-defined trade route. Our mission is to establish business contacts with voidfarers in need of regular ship repairs and those who are interested in specialised goods."

traits.locale_text: "Wir entwickeln Versorgungsrouten für Chartisten. Ihr müsst wissen, mein Schiff repräsentiert die Händlerflotte in diesem Teil des Territoriums des Imperiums, aber wir haben keine feste, vertraglich geregelte Handelsroute. Unsere Mission lautet, Geschäftskontakte mit Raumfahreren zu etablieren, die regelmäßig Schiffsreparaturen benötigen und Interesse an besonderen Waren haben."

languages.text: «Desarrollamos rutas de suministros para cartistas. Verá, mi nave representa a la Flota Mercante en esta zona del Imperium, pero no tenemos una ruta de comercio creada. Se nos ha encomendado establecer contactos comerciales con viajeros del vacío que necesiten reparaciones con frecuencia y con los que estén interesados en productos especializados».
languages.original_text: "We develop supply routes for Chartists. You see, my ship is a representative of the Merchant Fleet in this part of Imperium territory, yet we do not have a fixed, charter-defined trade route. Our mission is to establish business contacts with voidfarers in need of regular ship repairs and those who are interested in specialised goods."

traits.locale_text: «Desarrollamos rutas de suministros para cartistas. Verá, mi nave representa a la Flota Mercante en esta zona del Imperium, pero no tenemos una ruta de comercio creada. Se nos ha encomendado establecer contactos comerciales con viajeros del vacío que necesiten reparaciones con frecuencia y con los que estén interesados en productos especializados».

languages.text: "Haritacılar için ikmal rotaları kuruyoruz. Benim gemim, İmparatorluk'un diyarlarının bu taraflarındaki Tüccar Filosu'ndan sorumlu ama imtiyaznameyle tanımlanmış belli bir ticaret yolumuz yok. Görevimiz, olağan gemi onarımlarına ihtiyaç duyan uçsuz yolcularıyla ve daha özel mallarla ilgilenen diğer şahıslarla iş yapmak."
languages.original_text: "We develop supply routes for Chartists. You see, my ship is a representative of the Merchant Fleet in this part of Imperium territory, yet we do not have a fixed, charter-defined trade route. Our mission is to establish business contacts with voidfarers in need of regular ship repairs and those who are interested in specialised goods."

traits.locale_text: "İmtiyazlılar için ikmal rotaları kuruyoruz. Bakın mesela benim gemim İmparatorluk'un diyarlarının bu taraflarındaki Tüccar Filosu'ndan sorumlu ama imtiyaznameyle tanımlanmış belli bir ticaret yolumuz yok. Görevimiz, olağan gemi onarımlarına ihtiyaç duyan uçsuz yolcularıyla ve daha özel ürünlerle ilgilenen diğer kişilerle iş yapmak."
